title: Bug splat soon as nexus is destroyed
body: since the newest patch the game wont connect the first time i login...i always need to try 2 times before getting in. But the main issue is that in a match whenever my team wins a match and destroys the enemy nexus my client crashes and says bug splat report before the victory comes up. anyone know anything about this?

replies.body:
So, when you lose a game, it doesn't crash?

Have you tried running League in admin mode?
